title: Gamification-Based Language Competency Enhancement Course for Online Discussion Forum Participation

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A process for in-service elementary teachers to acquire discussion participation strategies in mobile environments and apply them to real-world tasks as part of a corporate-linked language education program

learning_goals: Learners actively participate in online discussion forums at least three times a week for 10 weeks using gamification elements
Learners increase knowledge-sharing frequency with peer teachers by 50% during the course through feedback systems and collaborative assignments
Learners maintain discussion participation continuity at over 80% using engagement elements (storytelling/avatars)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
